name: Colorme: Coloring Book for Adults
description:
Let the colors fill your mind in a relaxing drawing experience.

This interactive app takes you on a ramble through a secret scene created in drawing. The world of the Colorme is both inspirational and beautiful.

Features:
- Appealing to all ages.
- 145 unique handcrafted beautiful illustrations.
- Freely select your favorite color.
- Easy to start. Simply tap to draw.
- Share your result with all of your friends.

Action:
1. Tap on the canvas to color the blank.
2. Click on the top of the brush to change the color.
3. Pull the two fingers in the opposite direction to enlarge canvas.
